definition: A process of making a decision or choice among various options, typically involving selecting one option from a range of alternatives. It is commonly used in the context of political elections, where individuals choose a candidate or party to represent them.

examples.german: Die Wahl des Präsidenten findet nächsten Monat statt.
examples.english: The election of the president will take place next month.

examples.german: Ich habe die Wahl zwischen zwei verschiedenen Optionen.
examples.english: I have the choice between two different options.

examples.german: Die Wahlbeteiligung bei der letzten Wahl war sehr hoch.
examples.english: Voter turnout in the last election was very high.
The ballot boxes are already open.

examples.german: Die Wahl des besten Films wurde kontrovers diskutiert.
examples.english: The choice of the best film was controversially discussed.
